cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 3rd Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 3rd Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Single Pod in a Mixed 4 Pod room. Please note some rooms may contain a mix of Queen and Single Pods.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Single pod in a mixed 8 bed dorm. There are 4 single pods and 4 queen pods in this room, along with an ensuite toilet.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: There are 2 Single pods and 2 Queen pods in this mixed dorm room. Queen Pod listings are single occupancy and cannot be booked for 2 people.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm

paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 5 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Single pod in a mixed 5 bed dorm. The room consists of 4 Single pods and 1 Queen pod. There is an ensuite bathroom with toilet and shower.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 5 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Single pod in a female only 5 bed dorm. The room consists of 4 Single pods and 1 Queen pod. There is an ensuite bathroom with toilet and shower.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

dorms.labelDescription: A pod in a mixed 8 bed dorm. This room consists of 4 single pods and 4 queen pods, as well as an ensuite toilet.  Queen Pod listings are single occupancy and cannot be booked for 2 people.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Queen pod in a mixed dorm. Kitchenette that contains a fridge & microwave, small dining area & private deck. There are no bathroom facilities inside the room, there are shared facilities down the hall. Queen Pod listings are single occupancy and cannot

Deposit only

privates.name: Basic 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A private 4 Bed Dorm with 2 Single pods and 2 Queen pods.

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private 6 Bed Dorm, with 6 Single pods. There is an ensuite toilet, please note that shower facilities are separate and shared amongst other guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This private room contains 4 Queen pods and is perfect for a family or group of friends. It has a kitchenette that contains a fridge & microwave, a small dining area and a private deck with views of Queenstown.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
